# AsyncThrowingStream.Iterator

**Structure**

The asynchronous iterator for iterating an asynchronous stream.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Iterator
```

## Overview

This type is not `Sendable`. Don’t use it from multiple concurrent contexts. It is a programmer error to invoke `next()` from a concurrent context that contends with another such call, which results in a call to `fatalError()`.

## Iterating over Elements

- **next()**: The next value from the asynchronous stream.

## Instance Methods

- **next(isolation:)**: The next value from the asynchronous stream.

## Default Implementations

- **AsyncIteratorProtocol Implementations**

## Creating an Iterator

- **makeAsyncIterator()**: Creates the asynchronous iterator that produces elements of this asynchronous sequence.

## Conforms To

- AsyncIteratorProtocol

items.description: The next value from the asynchronous stream.
items.name: next()

items.description: The next value from the asynchronous stream.
items.name: next(isolation:)

items.description: Creates the asynchronous iterator that produces elements of this asynchronous sequence.
